trans-unit.source: Provides the base authentication interface for Web client authentication modules.
The <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> interface defines the properties and methods that custom authentication modules must use.
Authentication modules conduct the entire authentication process with a server, responding to an authentication challenge as appropriate.
This process may consist of requests to an authentication server separate from the resource server, as well as any other activities required to properly authenticate a request for a URI.

Custom authentication modules should implement the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> interface and then register with the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.Register%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
Authentication modules are also registered at program initialization by reading the configuration file.
Returns an instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref> class in respose to an authentication challenge from a server.

The <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.Authenticate%2A> method conducts the authentication process with the server and returns an <xref:System.Net.Authorization> instance to the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>.
The authentication challenge sent by the server.
The <xref href="System.Net.WebRequest"></xref> instance associated with the challenge.
The credentials associated with the challenge.
An <xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref> instance containing the authorization message for the request, or `null` if the challenge cannot be handled.
Gets the authentication type provided by this authentication module.
The <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A> property identifies the authentication type implemented by this authentication module.

The <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.Register%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine if the authentication module has been registered, and by the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to remove a registered authentication module.
A string indicating the authentication type provided by this authentication module.
Gets a value indicating whether the authentication module supports preauthentication.

The <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.CanPreAuthenticate%2A> property is set to `true` to indicate that the authentication module can respond with a valid <xref:System.Net.Authorization> instance when the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.PreAuthenticate%2A> method is called.
`true` if the authorization module supports preauthentication; otherwise `false`.
Returns an instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref> class for an authentication request to a server.

When the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.CanPreAuthenticate%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.PreAuthenticate%2A> method will return an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Authorization> class containing an authentication message.
The <xref href="System.Net.WebRequest"></xref> instance associated with the authentication request.
The credentials associated with the authentication request.
An <xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref> instance containing the authorization message for the request.
